mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_cart_item (cart_id, isbn13, quantity) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{isbn13}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_id AS cartId, ci.isbn13, bp.title, bp.authors, bp.publisher, bp.priceStandard AS price, bp.cover, ci.quantity FROM book_cart_item ci JOIN book_products bp ON ci.isbn13 = bp.isbn13 WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId}
